turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hi, how can i help you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'd like to order a Starbucks coffee, please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: what would you like to order?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: what type of milk do you prefer?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'll do 2% milk, no whip cream.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: so a grande mocha with 2% milk, correct?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: where would you like to pick it up?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: the Starbucks on Soldiers Field Road in Boston.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, your coffee will be ready for pickup soon at the starbucks on soldiersville road.
